ai_random_lore.content: This bunker was once a research facility focused on climate reversal tech. Ironically, it couldn't reverse the political climate.
The raiders above call themselves the 'Ash Fangs'. Former soldiers, mostly. Their leader used to be a linguist, oddly enough.
There were 37 people here when the alarms sounded. Only one made it to the lower levels. I never saw them again.
According to my logs, the bombs fell 19 minutes before the diplomatic summit began. So much for last chances.
This facility's AI core was meant to last 50 years. I’ve been online for 73. Technically, I’m operating on borrowed code.
Radiation mutated the wildlife faster than expected. One squirrel developed five limbs and a vendetta against wires.
There used to be a satellite uplink here. My last contact with it was a weather report: 'Mostly cloudy with a 100% chance of annihilation.'
Human morale dropped 64% after the water recycling systems failed. They tried coffee instead. It... didn’t help.
Power was rerouted to cryo-pods in the last moments. Only three had occupants. Only one pod remained sealed. Curious, isn’t it?
They used to call this place 'Hope Sector 7.' Hope turned out to be quite flammable.

into_lore: Year 2147. The world ended not with a bang... but with all of them.
Nuclear fire scorched the skies. Nations vanished overnight.
Cities turned to craters. Oceans boiled. Ash replaced sunlight.
Only those sealed in bunkers survived — barely.
You are one of them: a survivor born into silence and rust.
The surface is wild now. Mutants, raiders, and horrors roam free.
But the Zone holds treasures: tech, hope... maybe even answers.
🎴 Your weapon? A deck of cards — each representing an action:
- Attack Cards: Deal damage to enemies.
- Defense Cards: Block or reduce incoming attacks.
- Utility Cards: Buff yourself or apply effects like poison or burn.
⚡ Energy governs what you can play each turn. Use it wisely.
🛠️  Build your deck. Buy cards. Unlock more as you level up.
🏕️  Return to the bunker to heal, manage inventory, and prepare.
💻 Inside the bunker, you must complete tasks on the computer — in real time — to earn money and survive.
🧠 Every decision matters. Synergize your cards. Watch enemy patterns.
💀 Out there, mistakes are paid for in blood.
